movies.Title: Seven Samurai
movies.Writer: Akira Kurosawa (screenplay), Shinobu Hashimoto (screenplay), Hideo Oguni (screenplay)
movies.Actors: Toshirô Mifune, Takashi Shimura, Keiko Tsushima, Yukiko Shimazaki
movies.Plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 5 nominations.

movies.Title: City of God
movies.Actors: Alexandre Rodrigues, Leandro Firmino, Phellipe Haagensen, Douglas Silva
movies.Plot: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 57 wins & 26 nominations.

movies.Title: Se7en
movies.Actors: Morgan Freeman, Andrew Kevin Walker, Daniel Zacapa, Brad Pitt
movies.Plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 25 wins & 18 nominations.

movies.Title: The Usual Suspects
movies.Actors: Stephen Baldwin, Gabriel Byrne, Benicio Del Toro, Kevin Pollak
movies.Plot: A boat has been destroyed, criminals are dead, and the key to this mystery lies with the only survivor and his twisted, convoluted story beginning with five career crooks in a seemingly random police lineup.
